title: daedalus 0.0.1
text: Initial package setup including GitHub Actions workflows code quality checks. Updated GH Actions workflows R CMD check (fails ‘NOTE’) code test coverage; Added linting, citation update, Readme rendering, license year update workflows; Added spellchecking known words list.
